record.id: field.name="use.phases" and file.name="slamodulecontrol" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: use.phases
record.file.name: slamodulecontrol

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), uses phases to measure service levels for the record's Process Targets.
If cleared (set to false), Service Manager uses the Response State Progression list.

detail.detail: When Service Manager uses phases for the application being configured for Agreements, a record progresses through the series of phases defined in the Category phase table.
The name of the Category phase table is specified in the Object record for the indicated Table.
